attributes.action: The government should actively encourage all British newspapers to publish the Charlie Hebdo cartoons and guarantee protection to those who do!
attributes.additional_details: The government should encourage the newspapers of the UK to publish the Charlie Hebdo cartoons satirising all religions, specifically the Mohammed cartoons that lead to the death threats. The government should offer full support and protection to all newspapers, magazines and any adverts or other publications and pass a motion reaffirming the right to free speech!

rejection.details: Government does not interfere with editorial decisions of newspapers.
